data.name: Troll
data.description:
The Horde - Troll [A]
Units:
+5% evasion
-5% hit points

Buildings:
+10% attack rate
+10% hit points

Upgrades:
+3Lv Ranged Weapons
-5% costs in Main building

Magic:
Healing Wave (Heals 60 HP for 2 units)
Hex (Reduces target's dmg by -15%, AS by -8%)
Forked Lightning (Deals 200 damage to 5 units)

Traits: Why so serious? Come and have a smoke with us! Fragile in early game, unpredictable in late game. Debilitates and confuses enemy. You won't win all games, but you will have fun in every single one.

Difficulty: Skilled

auras.name: Restoring Mojo Aura
auras.description:
+0.05 MP/sec and +0.5 HP/sec to buildings
(4500 range)

Utility Aura

auras.name: Protective Voodoo Aura
auras.description:
+3 HP/s to allies, -3 HP/s to enemies
(affects organic units only)
(3500 range)

Lane Push Aura

auras.name: Dark Spears Aura
auras.description:
+100 building range
Towers and Barracks gain splash

Base Defence Aura

bonuses.name: Trained Zul'Jin [Q]
bonuses.description:
Zul'Jin replaces Spike

Special Unit (???)
-10% buy cooldown
Gets special items at Lv4/8/14/20
Role: Hybrid (Pusher)

Can learn: ???

Type: Late Game Push

spells.name: Zul'Jin
spells.description:
Special Unit (Ranged/Melee)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Heroes

Role: Hybrid (Asassins)

Can learn:
Shockwave (Damage Spell)
325-475 damage in a line
(750-900 wave distance)
(30 second cooldown)

Bloodlust (Self Spell)
12-30% attack rate bonus for 20 seconds
(60 second cooldown)

Troll Blood (Passive Skill)
10-40 HP/s regeneration bonus

Taz'dingo! (Self Spell)
1600-4000 HP, +6 armor
While in melee form, Zul'jin has different abilities
(lasts 60s, has 120s cooldown)

Type: Late Game Push

spells.name: Zul'Jin
spells.description:
Special Unit (Melee)
-10% buy cooldown
Gets special items at Lv4/8/14/20
Role: Hybrid (Tank)

Can learn:
Troll Warcry (Damage Spell)
325-475 dmg in an area, 20-32% slow
(300-600 area of effect)
(45 second cooldown)

Enchanted Blade (Orb Effect)
10-16% lifesteal

Quick Reflexes (Passive Skill)
12-30% chance to dodge an attack

Taz'dingo! (Self Spell)
1600-4000 HP, +6 armor
While in melee form, Zul'jin has different abilities
(lasts 60s, has 120s cooldown)

Type: Late Game Push

bonuses.name: Dark Troll Berserker [E]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Berserk

Berserker replaces Skullsplinter
Melee Unit
+10% attack rate
+125 HP
Abilities:
Battle Trance (Passive Skill)
(+200% attack rate for 6 sec)
Lightning Reflexes (Passive Skill)
(evasion increased by 10%)
Upgrades used:
Arcanite Blades
Arcanite Armor
Troll Regeneration
Berserk

Type: Early Push / Unit Power

bonuses.name: Biggest Baddest Voodoo [C]
bonuses.description:
Every 60 seconds summons random positive or negative aura that affects all units on the map.

Type: Trolling / Unique Bonus

spells.name: Biggest Baddest Voodoo
spells.description:
Every 60 seconds summons random positive or negative aura that affects all units on the map.

Type: Trolling / Unique Bonus

spells.name: Force the Hand Of Fate [V]
spells.description:
Immediately change current effect to the next one

(cost 100 gold)
(has 60 seconds cooldown)

spells.name: Spin Fate [F]
spells.description:
Change next Voodoo effect to another random one

(cost 50 gold)
(has 30 seconds cooldown)

bonuses.name: Veteran Headhunter [R]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Shredder Spears

Veteran Headhunter replaces Headhunter
Ranged Unit
+20% attack rate
+75 HP
Abilities:
Bleed (Disable Spell)
(25% to reduce speed by 25%)
(does not affect Special unit)
Weak Spot (Passive Skill)
(20% to do 3x damage)
Upgrades used:
Arcanite Blades
Arcanite Armor
Troll Regeneration
Shredder Spears
Berserk

Type: Minor Anti Hero / Unit Power

bonuses.name: High Priest [A]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Mind Control

High Priest replaces Witch Doctor
Spellcaster
+20% attack rate
+50 HP
+75 MP
Abilities:
Magic Shield (Support Spell)
(absorbs spell damage)
(75/125/175/225 dmg)
Battle Trance (Cast Spell)
(25% chance to give 10% attack rate for 90 sec)
Upgrades used:
Voodoo (Upgrades Abilities)
Arcanite Armor
Troll Regeneration
Mind Control

Type: Anti Magic

bonuses.name: Big Angry Polar Bear [Z]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Mighty Blow
+1 level of Impenetrable Hide

Polar Bear replaces Demolisher
Siege Unit (Melee)
+60% attack rate
+1200 HP
+3 armor
Abilities:
Cleaving Attack (Passive Skill)
(40% area damage)

Arcanite Blades
Arcanite Armor
Mighty Blow
Feral Roar
Impenetrable Hide
Berserk

Type: Late Game Push / Unit Power

bonuses.name: Voodoo Experts [X]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Voodoo Wardbearer

Icreases Stronghold and Witch Doctor mana by 10%. Unlocks more upgrades inside this building. Reduces cooldowns of defensive Stronghold spells by 30%.

Type: Magic Power / Base Defence

upgrades.description:
Gives:
+0.1 MP/sec Stronghold mana reg

upgrades.name: Empowerment
upgrades.description:

+12 Witch Doctor damage
-10% Witch Doctor spell cooldown

Hex +2% attack rate, +5% damage

upgrades.name: Voodoo Power
upgrades.description:
Gives:
Witch Doctor has 15% to cast any ability twice

bonuses.name: Item Merchant [V]
bonuses.description:
Your heroes will receive a random item for hero kill by them or your units and every 4 level. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell random items to free up inventory slots.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

bonuses.description:

Arcanite Armor
Troll Regeneration

Mighty Blow

towerUpgrades.name: Feral Roar
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus damage to nearby units
Affects: Beastrider
(affects organic units only)

Lv1: +10% damage for 20 sec
Lv2: +20% damage for 25 sec
Lv3: +30% damage for 30 sec
Lv4: +40% damage for 35 sec

towerUpgrades.name: Troll Regeneration
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: health regeneration
Affects: Skullsplinter, Headhunter, Witch Doctor and Wardbearer

Lv1: +1.5 HP/sec regeneration
Lv2: +3 HP/sec regeneration
Lv3: +4.5 HP/sec regeneration
Lv4: +6 HP/sec regeneration

towerUpgrades.name: Shredder Spears
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: passive damage AoE/target
Affects: Spear Tower and Headhunter

Lv1: 15% chance for 20 damage
Lv2: 30% chance for 30 damage
Lv3: 45% chance for 40 damage
Lv4: 60% chance for 50 damage

towerUpgrades.name: Berserk
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: chance to attack twice
Affects: Skullsplinter and Headhunter

Lv1: 10% chance
Lv2: 20% chance
Lv3: 30% chance
Lv4: 40% chance

towerUpgrades.name: Mighty Blow
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: chance to stun on each attack
Affects: Beastrider
(does not affect Special unit)
(has 0.5s duration on Heroes)

Lv1: 10% chance for 1.2 sec stun
Lv2: 20% chance for 1.4 sec stun
Lv3: 30% chance for 1.6 sec stun
Lv4: 40% chance for 1.8 sec stun

towerUpgrades.name: Impenetrable Hide
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: attack block and spell resistance
Affects: Beastrider and Batrider

Lv1: 6% to block, -15% spell damage
Lv2: 12% to block, -30% spell damage
Lv3: 18% to block, -45% spell damage
Lv4: 24% to block, -60% spell damage

towerUpgrades.name: Burning Oil
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: deals damage over time
Affects: Batrider and Demolisher

Lv1: 6 damage/sec for 2 seconds
Lv2: 12 damage/sec for 3 seconds
Lv3: 18 damage/sec for 4 seconds
Lv4: 24 damage/sec for 5 seconds

towerUpgrades.name: Voodoo Wardbearer
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: extra unit in each wave
Affects: All Barracks
(can capture neutral buildings)

Lv1: has Corruption Ward (reduces armor)
-2/-4/-6/-8 armor in 900 AoE
Lv2: has Stasis Ward (invisible stun trap)
30/60/90 sec duration, 2/3/4 sec stun
Lv3: has Voodoo Ward (reduces damage)
-15%/-20% damage in 900 AoE
Lv4: has Serpent Ward (attacks enemies)
summons 1 ward

towerUpgrades.name: Mind Control
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: chance to take over units
Affects: Witch Doctor

Lv1: 2% chance on each attack
Lv2: 4% chance on each attack
Lv3: 6% chance on each attack
Lv4: 8% chance on each attack

heroes.name: Battlemasta
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Support

Can learn:
Battle Standard (Summoning Spell)
gives 15-33% bonus dmg and 25 HP/sec for 30 seconds
(900 area of effect)
(45 second cooldown)

Thunder Clap (Damage Spell)
175-325 damage, 10-22% slow
(250-400 area of effect)
(30 second cooldown)

Endurance Aura (Support Aura)
8-14% attack, move speed bonus

Big Bad Voodoo (Self Spell)
10-16 sec near invulnerability
(45 second cooldown)

skills.name: Healing Ward - [Level 1]
skills.description: Summons an immovable ward that heals 25 of a nearby friendly non-mechanical unit's hit points per second.

skills.name: Thunder Clap - [Level 4]
skills.description: Slams the ground, dealing <AHtc,DataA4> damage to nearby enemy land units and slowing their movement by <AHtc,DataC4,%>% and attack rate by <AHtc,DataD4,%>%.

skills.name: Endurance Aura - [Level 4]
skills.description: Increases nearby friendly units' speed by 8%.

skills.name: Big Bad Voodoo - [Level 1]
skills.description: An impenetrable shield surrounds this unit, protecting it from all damage and spells for 10 seconds.

heroes.name: Shadow Hunter
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Ranged)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Nuker

Can learn:
Forked Lightning (Damage Spell)
225-375 damage, 6-12 units
(30 second cooldown)

Charged Blades (Orb Effect)
15-27% for 150 area damage
(350 area of effect)

Voodoo Spirits (Damage Spell)
6 spirits for 15-27s
(1 wisp damage in 100)
(heals 1500 hp)
(75-87 second cooldown)

Serpent Wards (Summoning Spell)
summons 1-7 wards
(70 second cooldown)

skills.name: Forked Lightning - [Level 4]
skills.description: Calls forth a cone of lightning on a target enemy unit, hitting up to 8 enemy units for 225 damage.

skills.name: Charged Blades - [Level 1]
skills.description: Gives a 15% chance to deal 150 area damage.

skills.name: Voodoo Spirits - [Level 3]
skills.description: Creates a swarm of angry spirits that drain the life energies of nearby enemy units.

skills.name: Serpent Wards - [Level 4]
skills.description: Summons 1 serpentine ward.

(doesn't affect Special unit)
(84-96 second cooldown)

skills.name: Greater Hex - [Level 1]
skills.description: Transforms an enemy Hero into a random critter for 3 seconds.

skills.description: Decreases armor by 2 and deals 15 damage per second for 15 seconds.

skills.name: Stasis Lock - [Level 1]
